mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( M_CODE, M_ID, M_PASSWD, M_NAME, M_NICK, M_EMAIL, CREATED_AT, M_TEL, M_GENDER, M_GRADE, M_AUTH ) VALUES ( 'MEM' || LPAD(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{m_id}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{m_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{m_tel}, #{m_gender}, 'BASIC', 'USER' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{m_id}
SELECT M_CODE, M_ID, M_NAME, M_NICK, M_EMAIL, M_TEL, M_GENDER, M_GRADE, M_AUTH, CREATED_AT FROM MEMBER ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT M_CODE, M_ID, M_NAME, M_NICK, M_EMAIL, M_TEL, M_GENDER, M_GRADE, M_AUTH, CREATED_AT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_CODE = #{m_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PASSWD = #{m_passwd}, M_NAME = #{m_name}, M_NICK = #{m_nick}, M_EMAIL = #{m_email}, M_TEL = #{m_tel}, M_GENDER = #{m_gender} WHERE M_CODE = #{m_code}
mapper.select: SELECT M_CODE, M_ID, M_PASSWD, M_NAME, M_NICK, M_EMAIL, M_TEL, M_GENDER, M_GRADE, M_AUTH, CREATED_AT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{m_id}
